member.name: T:StringToStronglyTyped.StronglyTypedConverter
member.summary: Implementation to convert string to a strong-typed object.

member.name: M:StringToStronglyTyped.StronglyTypedConverter.ToType(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Converts a string value to another type.
member.param: The string value to be converted.
The type to which the value will be converted.
member.returns: Returns an instance of the converted value.

member.name: M:StringToStronglyTyped.StronglyTypedConverter.ToType``1(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string value to another type.
member.typeparam: The type to which the value will be converted.
member.param: The string value to be converted.
member.returns: Returns an instance of the converted value.

member.name: M:StringToStronglyTyped.StronglyTypedConverter.ToType``1(System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.summary: Converts an instance to a strongly-typed object.
member.typeparam: The type to which the value will be converted.
member.param: The dictionary instance to be converted.
member.returns: Returns an instance of the converted value.

member.name: M:StringToStronglyTyped.StronglyTypedConverter.StringInvariantCultureIgnoreCaseEquals(System.String,System.String)
member.param: The first string in the comparison.
The second string in the comparison.
member.returns: Returns true if the strings are the equal, otherwise, false.

member.name: M:StringToStronglyTyped.StronglyTypedConverter.Split(System.String,System.Char)
member.param: The delimiter to use to split the string.

member.name: T:StringToStronglyTyped.StronglyTypedMetadataAttribute
member.summary: Properties of the Strongly-typed class should be marked with this attribute in order to convert it.

member.name: M:StringToStronglyTyped.StronglyTypedMetadataAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of StronglyTypedMetadataAttribute.

member.name: P:StringToStronglyTyped.StronglyTypedMetadataAttribute.IsRequired
member.summary: Gets or sets the value whether the property is required/mandatory. The default value is true.

member.name: P:StringToStronglyTyped.StronglyTypedMetadataAttribute.DefaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the default value of the property.

member.name: P:StringToStronglyTyped.StronglyTypedMetadataAttribute.CustomLoadMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the method name of the custom parsing to be executed after a property is loaded.
